tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE eco_conscious_customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    eco_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    eco_conscious BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE eco_conscious_consumers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    eco_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preferred_category VARCHAR(50),
    favorite_brand VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  age_group VARCHAR(20),
  income_range VARCHAR(20),
  spending_preference VARCHAR(50),
  eco_friendly_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_pattern VARCHAR(50),
  feedback VARCHAR(200),
  social_media_engagement BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    stock_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE segment_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE
)
